data.text: @AmeriZara Just my opinion, I don't think there will be enough ammunition. The government doesn't necessarily have to take the guns away.
@AmeriZara Yes, I do know that you know that well.
@AmeriZara They have Guillotines awaiting the freethinkers.

@AmeriZara I told them the vaccines are untested, and to take them in light of a 98.5 recovery rate or higher, is sheer foolishness. People are getting incredible pressure because of their jobs to take the vaccine. They seem completely immune to the obvious agenda being put in place.

@AmeriZara Yes it is very disturbing. And all the quarantines where people have been separated from their loved ones as they were dying it's just unimaginably horrible to think about. I know people who are taking the vaccine right now despite all my warnings against it and it rattles me.
@AmeriZara Very sorry to hear about your loss, especially due to a diabolical agenda against humanity. Very sad.
